entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.20.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix datepicker default value not updating on enabling time selection

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.20.2...v2.20.3

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.20.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed debounce causing separate events to not be triggered

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.20.3...v2.20.4

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v2.67.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Platform CE Backlog Bug Fixes by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10859
  • Onboarding+ WhiteLablelling changes by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10981
  • Pending Backlog Issues by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/10823
  • Static Folder counts on app search + minor fixes by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/11047
  • Email Images and New Organization dropdown UI by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/11000
  • Email Footer Icon CSS Fix by @rudeUltra in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/11066
  • Release Platfrom v20.4 [v2.67.1] by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/11005

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v2.67.0...v2.67.1
